events.comment: Spoiler: I was too lazy to comment all of this shit, so bleh. Besides, most of this is pretty basic code anyways.

sub-events.comment: On collision with an invisible object (which is set above spring), set vector X/Y to a certain number which you can pick
Type: 1: NormalShield 2: Invinciblity 3: ElectricShield 4: BubbleShield 5: FireShield
There are 2 objects: the spike itself, and an invisible hitbox. When you collide with the hit box and if you had rings or a shield, you'd be knocked back. But if you have no rings or shield, you die
Basically a spring except with no Y power
Following stuff is used for exiting/entering water
unfinished code for having block fall
On collision with Pipe_Entry object (which has a set direction), the player's physics is disabled, the Path is set to 2, and the Player's movement is set
Object which changes the Player's direction in the pipes
